text: The Old Moscow Central Bus Terminal was the main bus station of Moscow from 1971 until 2015. The station was closed in 2015 when the new Moscow "Southern Gate" Central Bus Terminal was open. The station was located in the eastern side of the city and demolished. == Other websites == * Old Moscow Central Bus Terminal - official site (Russian) Category:Buildings and structures in Moscow Category:Bus transport in Russia
title: Old Moscow Central Bus Terminal
